meanings.sent1: After the storm, I had to reseal the windows to keep the rain out.
meanings.sent2: She carefully resealed the envelope before sending it off.
meanings.sent3: The magician resealed the box, making the audience wonder how the rabbit disappeared.
meanings.sent4: The detective resealed the crime scene, hoping to preserve any crucial evidence.
meanings.sent5: The chef resealed the jar of spices to keep them fresh for longer.

meanings.sent1: The resealing of the package was necessary to prevent leaks during shipping.
meanings.sent2: The resealing of the bottle ensured the contents stayed fresh.
meanings.sent3: The resealing of the treasure chest made it look even more mysterious.
meanings.sent4: The resealing of the contract was a sign of mutual agreement.
meanings.sent5: The resealing of the ancient scroll revealed hidden secrets.
